items.sentence: Tom lost his job because the firm decided that a robot could do his job better.
Tom doesn\'t swim, but he likes sitting by the pool watching his children swim.
Why don\'t you guys go on into the living room and make yourselves comfortable?
All Tom wanted was to find a woman who would accept all the love he could give.
I\'m sure Tom will come back as soon as he realizes he left his briefcase here.
